title: LA-18-05: Annual Update of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) Post-Employment Component Designations due to OGE by July 1, 2018
summary: In this Legal Advisory, OGE asks each agency to forward to OGE its annual letter stating whether its components that are currently designated should remain designated for purposes of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c). Any request to modify the existing list of components should be submitted in accordance with regulatory procedures.
